name: astra snowflake
notes:
this project is small and very quick to make. it will complement your other, bigger snowflakes in a lovely way, because the size difference makes things interesting.

this snowflake is a part of the 2025 free crochet snowflake patterns collection. see all snowflake patterns [here on crochetpedia.com][1].

the pattern is available in the form of **written instructions** and **video tutorials** for right- and left-handed crocheters.


  [1]: https://crochetpedia.com/crochet-snowflakes-mini-cal/
